          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A későreneszánsz Magyarországon</string>
            <string language="en">the late renaissance in Hungary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die späte Renaissance in Ungarn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la Renaissance en retard en Hongrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o renascimento atrasado em Hungria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la rinascita ritardata in Ungheria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η πρόσφατη αναγέννηση στην Ουγγαρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el último renacimiento en Hungría</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A későreneszánsz Magyarországon</string>
            <string language="en">the late renaissance in Hungary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">17. szaázad,  kőfaragás,  Kolozsvár,  Erdélyi Fejedelemség,  polgári építészet,  kastély sgraffito,  pártázatos reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">17th century, stone carving, Kolozsvár, Transilvanian principality, civil architecture, castle sgraffito, gorgeous renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die späte Renaissance in Ungarn</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la Renaissance en retard en Hongrie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o renascimento atrasado em Hungria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la rinascita ritardata in Ungheria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η πρόσφατη αναγέννηση στην Ουγγαρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el último renacimiento en Hungría</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">17. Jahrhundert, schnitzender Stein, Kolozsvár, 
Transilvanian Fürstentum, Zivilarchitektur, Schloß Sgraffito, 
herrliche Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">17ème siècle, pierre découpant, Kolozsvár, 
principauté de Transilvanian, architecture civile, sgraffito de 
château, la Renaissance magnifique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">17o século, pedra que carving, Kolozsvár, principality
de Transilvanian, arquitetura civil, sgraffito do castelo, 
renascimento gorgeous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diciassettesimo secolo, pietra che intaglia, 
Kolozsvár, principality di Transilvanian, architettura civile, 
sgraffito del castello, rinascita gorgeous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">17$ος αιώνας, γλυπτική πετρών, Kolozsvαr, 
Transilvanian πριγκηπάτο, αστική αρχιτεκτονική, sgraffito, 
πανέμορφη αναγέννηση κάστρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">17mo siglo, piedra que talla, Kolozsvár, principado de
Transilvanian, configuración civil, sgraffito del castillo, 
renacimiento magnífico</string>
          </keyword>
